name: ROUTE81
description:
ROUTE81 a BASIC 10-Liner videogame for the Sinclair ZX81

ROUTE81 is an action/racing game for the Sinclair ZX81 8-bit home computer.
It is my second entry to the 2021 edition of the BASIC 10 Liner Contest. The game has been entirely coded in BASIC language and the program is 10 lines long.

Drive your shiny sports car along the most iconic highway in computer history! Avoid the other cars and going off the road.

If you like ROUTE81, please consider voting it for the Public's Choice special award, by giving a ❤️ to this tweet.
